sentences.english: Chou Chin gave special praise to Fan Chin.
sentences.chinese: 周進特別對范進讚揚勉勵了一番。

sentences.english: I was very low-spirited, but father and mother encouraged me a lot.
sentences.chinese: 我非常低沉，可爸爸媽媽給我很大勉勵。

sentences.english: Their parents should encourage and help them, and in no wise hinder them from following God's call.
sentences.chinese: 該當勉勵相幫他們，萬不可阻撓兒童隨天主的聖召。

sentences.english: He often exhorts Mary to work harder .
sentences.chinese: 他經常勉勵瑪麗要更加努力工作。

sentences.english: Encourage him, because he will lead Israel to inherit it.
sentences.chinese: 你要勉勵他，因爲他要使以色列人承受那地爲業。

sentences.english: He appointed the priests to their duties and encouraged them in the service of the Lord 's temple.
sentences.chinese: 王分派祭司各盡其職，又勉勵他們辦耶和華殿中的事。

sentences.english: So I always take pains to have a clear conscience toward both God and man.
sentences.chinese: 我因此自己勉勵，對神對人，常存無虧的良心。

sentences.english: You need the prayer support and encouragement of other believers.
sentences.chinese: 你需要禱告上的支持，需要其他信徒給你的勉勵。

sentences.english: Xia ended the ceremony with a short but encouraging speech.
sentences.chinese: 開學儀式以夏谷鳴副校長的勉勵結束。

sentences.english: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works
sentences.chinese: 又要彼此相顧，激發愛心，勉勵行善。

sentences.english: And herein do I exercise myself, to have always a conscience void of offence toward God, and toward men.
sentences.chinese: 我因此自己勉勵，對神，對人，常存無虧的良心。

sentences.english: The general exhorted his men to fight well.
sentences.chinese: 將軍勉勵他的戰士們英勇作戰。

definition: to develop/to make full use of
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
to show concern and care for
to praise/to approve of/to show approval
